div.p: In the name of God. Qurrah, etc. We have apportioned to your administrative district 11 nominal solidi for the wages and supplies of a sawyer — 1 person — intended for the work (5) at the mosque of Damascus for 6 months in the present 8th indiction, and having made out the demand notes for these to the people of the separate places, we have sent them to you. On receiving the present letter, therefore, in accordance with the powers given by them, collect the said quota of money and send it (10) to us for the wages and supplies of the said skilled workman. Written the 7th Hathyr, 8th ind.
20th Choiach, 8th ind. Brought by Mary the supercargo (?); concerning 11 solidi for the wages and supplies of a sawyer.
